member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.MembershipProvidersServices.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Creates a new User account in Ingeniux CMS. In Membership Provider is integrated account provider (Ingeniux Membership Provider or SQL provider), allow to set password using the provider.
Also, it will try to send 2 email out to the new user's email address, first to inform user that the account has been created, second to send user the password of the new account.
If for any reason the email cannot be sent out, the password information will be brought back to client, so the Administrator can manually inform new user the password.

param.name: providerName
param.para: Name of the membership provider. It is the value of "name" attribute in for the provide entry local-membership.config

member.param: User Account Name (Id)
Password for user account to set by Membership Provider. Only needed for Integrated providers
Email address of the new User

returns.para: The status information on user creation.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return - Email successful. Note that the "Newpassword" field is null, and no email errors
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "EmailError": null, "EmailError2": null, "EmailSent": true, "MinNonAlphaNumericCharactersLength": 2, "MinPasswordLength": 8, "NewUser": "TestUser", "Newpassword": null, "Status": "Success", "StatusDetail": "" } }

Sample JSON return - Email not successful, either due to invalid System Options > Email settings, or problem reaching target domain. We will receive email errors, and the password. Therefore, to make sure the password is not exposed, make sure to configure Email settings correctly, and make sure the User's email address is correct.
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "EmailError": "The parameter 'from' cannot be an empty string.\u000d\u000aParameter name: from", "EmailError2": "The parameter 'from' cannot be an empty string.\u000d\u000aParameter name: from", "EmailSent": false, "MinNonAlphaNumericCharactersLength": 2, "MinPasswordLength": 8, "NewUser": "TestUser", "Newpassword": "letmein", "Status": "Success", "StatusDetail": "" } }

remarks.para: This operation is to be used with integrated providers only. It is used to create authentication account, not used to create Ingeniux CMS users.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.PublishingSystemManagerServices.SavePubTarget(IngeniuxCMService.PublishingTargetSaveInput)
member.summary: Saves a single Publishing Target with updated information

param.name: data
param.para: The updated information on the Publishing Target and its underlying replication system
param.example:
Sample JSON input
{ "data": { "info": { "name": "Live", "id": "PublishingTargets/1", "rootPage": "x2", "rootPageName": "Site", "site": "", "transformOnPublish": false, "userAgent": "", "analytics": { "analyticsEnabled": false, "provider": "Ingeniux.Analytics.Google.AnalyticsDataProvider, Ingeniux.Analytics" }, "autoRedirectCanonicalURL": true, "baseUrl": "", "enableDynamicPublishing": true, "externalPreviewURL": "DssPreview/IGXDynamicPreview", "forceLowerCaseURL": true, "globalContentRoot": "", "homePageId": "x5", "iceEnabled": true, "iceFieldMarkupUpdateURL": "DssPreview/IGXDTICEUpdate", "includeFoldersInURL": false, "normalizeUrlSeparators": false, "page404Id": "", "pubFolder": "Live", "structuredUrlEnabled": true, "urlExtension": "xml", "urlSeparator": "-", "useExternalPreviewURL": true, "newEntry": false, "analyticsProvider": "Ingeniux.Analytics.Google.AnalyticsDataProvider, Ingeniux.Analytics", "analyticsEnabled": false }, "members": ["UserGroup/1", "UserGroups/1"], "replication": { "doReplication": true, "simultaneousReplication": false, "targets": [{ "type": "FileReplicationTarget", "ID": "bc24ec5353c9417590dbcc27ee56f005", "data": "{\"Disabled\":false,\"ID\":\"bc24ec5353c9417590dbcc27ee56f005\",\"Name\":\"File\",\"Description\":\"\",\"TargetLocation\":\"G:\\\\SyncTests\\\\file2\",\"CompareContent\":false,\"UseCommands\":false,\"PreReplicationCommand\":\"\",\"PreReplicationCommandTimeout\":10,\"PostReplicationCommand\":\"\",\"PostReplicationCommandTimeout\":10,\"UseImpersonation\":false,\"ImpersonateUserName\":\"\",\"ImpersonateUserDomain\":\"\",\"ImpersonatePassword\":\"\"}", "exemptLocations": [], "additionalLocations": [], "cleanupExemptLocations": [] }] } } }

returns.para: Updated information of the Publishing Target after save, and list of all Publishing Targets

remarks.para: If Publishing Target doesn't exist, or Root Page doesn't exist, returns error status
If Structured URL is enabled, but Structured URL home page doesn't exist, returns error status
If Global Content Root Page id is not empty, but the Page doesn't exist, returns error status

returns.para: Summary of Site Definitions Localization, including localization for Schemas, Page Creation Rules, Workflow Definitions and Workstates

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteDefinitionsLocalizationServices.GetPageSchemas
member.summary: Retrieves localization on all Page Schemas of the site. The name on each entry is localized name if localization exists

returns.para: Collection of localized or original basic information on Schemas for creating Pages

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteDefinitionsLocalizationServices.GetComponentSchemas
member.summary: Retrieves localization on all Component Schemas of the site. The name on each entry is localized name if localization exists

returns.para: Collection of localized or original basic information on Schemas for creating Components

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteDefinitionsLocalizationServices.GetPCRs
member.summary: Retrieves localization on all Page Creation Rules on the site. The name of each entry is localized name if localization exists

returns.para: Collection of localized or original basic information of Page Creation Rules

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteDefinitionsLocalizationServices.GetWorkflowDefinitions
member.summary: Retrieves all Workflow Definitions on the site. The name of each entry is localized name if localization exists

returns.para: Collection of localized or original basic information of Workflow Definitions

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteDefinitionsLocalizationServices.GetWorkstates
member.summary: Retrieves all Workstates on the site. The name of each entry is localized name if localization exists

returns.para: Collection of localized or original basic information of Workstates

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.ISystemOptionsServices.GetData(IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsGetParam)
member.remarks: This service must return a JSON-serialized string. Because the return can be anything from the old structure, this requires one further step from the client script to deserialize the JSON data from the response message.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.ISystemOptionsServices.SetData(IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsSetInputInfo)
member.remarks: This service must use JSON string as an input and a return. Because the types of input are so different from each other and impossible to deserialize, the client-side script must first double-serialize the object parameter.

member.name: T:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices
member.summary: Provides the functionality to manage Ingeniux CMS global settings.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetData(IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsGetParam)
member.summary: Retrieves an single Configuration by its unique Id

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the unique Id of the configuration entry

returns.para: Data of the configuration entry

remarks.para: Please note that the "data" property of the response is serialize JSON string. It will be the same JSON string for SOAP services too.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.SetData(IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsSetInputInfo)
member.summary: Updates a single configuration entry new data

param.name: data
param.para: Object contains updated information of the configuration entry.
param.remarks: The "data" property of the input is a serialized JSON string. It must also be passed in as serialized JSON string on SOAP services too.

returns.para: Object containing the information of whether the update was successful. If the updates were on a XHTML editor configuration entry, updated "tinymceConfig" message will include serialized JSON string as result.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetPossibleTinyMceData(IngeniuxCMService.TinyMcePossibleDataGetParam)

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the name of the property to get candidates for
param.remarks: The choices for propertyName are: PossibleButtons, PossiblePlugins, PossibleBlockFormats, PossibleFonts, PossibleFonts, RequiredPlugins

returns.para: Array of TinyMce property value candidates

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetToolbarButtons
member.summary: Retrieves the all the available Toolbar button to construct the Toolbar for Ingeniux CMS site client. This result of this operation is all the global and Page level functionalities available to choose from.

returns.para: Array of all available Toolbar buttons

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetAllCustomTabs
member.summary: Retrieves all available Custom Tabs information. Custom Tabs are custom application modules with user interface exposed as a Tab on the Ingeniux CMS site client.

returns.para: Array of Custom Tabs information

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetServerVariables
member.summary: Retrieves all built-in HTTP server variables. These server variable are part of W3C HTTP specifications

returns.para: Array of all built-in HTTP server variables
returns.remarks: The result is generated from the request going into the operation. If request included custom server variables, they will be included in the result too.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetPossibleTreeMenuItems
member.summary: Retrieves the collection of Menu Items on the Site Tree context menu. This result reflects what functionalitis are available on the Ingeniux CMS Site tree.

returns.para: Collection of Site Tree context menu items

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetTimeZones
member.summary: Retrieves information of all the Time Zones in the world.

returns.para: Collection of all Time Zones information

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.RemoveDictionary(IngeniuxCMService.RemoveDictionaryInput)
member.summary: Removes a Spell check dictionary dictionary for a specific locale

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the locale name for the dictionary to be removed

returns.para: Object containing the dictionary and affix files that were deleted for the given locale. The file paths are relative to "xml" folder

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetGroupsForTinyMCESettings(IngeniuxCMService.SettingGetParam)
member.summary: Retrieves the User Groups that have a XHTML editor specific settings defined for it

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the settings name to retrieve the User Groups, that have the specific settings defined

returns.para: The collection of User Groups basic information. These Groups that specific override defined for the given settings name

remarks.para: XHTML editor has a default setting for every User Group out of box. However, administrators can create Group Profiles that will override the default settings in a specific area.
There are following settings name that are allowed:
Default, Plugins, BlockFormats, Fonts, FontSizes, TableCssClass, ImageCssClass, LinkCssClass, RemoveButtons, CommandRow, ContentCssFile
Any other settings name will be invalid, and causes return of error status.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.RemoveGroupProfileForTinyMCESettings(IngeniuxCMService.GroupProfileRemovalParam)
member.summary: Removes a User Group override on a specific XHTML editor setting.

param.name: data
param.para: Object containg the settings name and the User Group to remove the profile for.

returns.para: Object containing the settings name and User Group Id to remove the profile on. Also, whether the profile was removed or not.

remarks.para: If override profile doesn't exist for the given User Group, returns false

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.RemoveGroupProfileForTreeMenu(IngeniuxCMService.GroupProfileRemovalParam)
member.summary: Removes the User Group override on Tree Menu items listing setting

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing User Group Id for remove the profile for

returns.para: Object containing the User Group Id to remove the profile for and whether the removal was successful

remarks.para: If override profile doesn't exist for the given User Group, returns false

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.RemoveGroupProfileForToolbar(IngeniuxCMService.GroupProfileRemovalParam)
member.summary: Removes the User Group override on Toolbar buttons listing setting

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing User Group Id for remove the profile for

returns.para: Object containing the User Group Id to remove the profile for and whether the removal was successful

remarks.para: If override profile doesn't exist for the given User Group, returns false

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetGroupsForToolbarSettings
member.summary: Retrieves complete list of User Groups for Toolbar settings. Each Group item indicates if override profiles exists for this Group.

returns.para: List of User Groups. Each item contains also User Rights compond numbers and whether there is a override profile for this Group in the "_checked" property.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.GetGroupsForTreeMenu
member.summary: Retrieves complete list of User Groups for Site Tree Context Menu items settings. Each Group item indicates if override profiles exists for this Group.

returns.para: List of User Groups. Each item contains also User Rights compond numbers and whether there is a override profile for this Group in the "_checked" property.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.CreateCustomLocale(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Creates a custom Locale entry. Custom locales are language defined for very specific region, that are not covered by the built-in list of locales.
We could create a custom locale "en-us-tx", named "Texas English", but a site that is targetted to audiences in Texas.
member.param: Name of the custom locale, cannot be a duplicate of a built-in locale or another custom locale

param.name: baseLocale
param.para: The built-in locale this custom locale is based on
param.example: "Texas English (en-us-tx)" is created based on "English United States (en-us)";
param.remarks: Custom locales must be on a built-in locale, or returns error status

member.param: The descriptive name of the custom locale in English

returns.para: The information for created custom locale

remarks.para: If base locale doesn't exist as a built-in locale, returns error status
If locale name or English name is not provided, returns error status
If another built-in for custom locale already using the same locale name (not English name), returns error status

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SystemOptionsServices.RemoveCustomLocale(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes a custom locale by its locale name.
member.param: Locale name of the custom locale "en-us-tx"
member.returns: True if custom locale with given name exists and removed, false otherwise.

remarks.para: If there are any Pages still using the custom locale, then the locale cannot be removed. Returns error status.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.UserManagerServices.DeleteUsers(IngeniuxCMService.UniqueObjectsDeleteParam)
member.summary: Deletes a collection of Users. This will automatically remove their membership from their belonging User Groups too.

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the User Id (login name) of Users to be deleted

remarks.para: The items in "selectedIds" field are URI encoded User Ids

returns.para: Array of User Ids of the Users that has been removed

remarks.para: Non-existing Users will be ignored
Note that this operation will not automatically remove the integrated Users from their Membership Providers store.
The operation performs that task.

param.para: Object containing the Id of the User Groups to be deleted

returns.para: Array of Ids of User Groups that were actually deleted

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.UserManagerServices.SaveSingleUser(IngeniuxCMService.SaveUserInput)
member.summary: Updates an existing User with new data

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing updated details of the existing User

returns.para: The basic information of the update User, plus information of which User Groups were affected with this update.

remarks.para: If User doesn't exist, returns error status.
The User's name, user Id, and email information are URI encoded in the return message.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.UserManagerServices.CreateNewGroup(IngeniuxCMService.SaveGroupInput)
member.summary: Creates a new User Group

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the data on the new User Group to be created

returns.para: Basic information of the newly created User Group

remarks.para: If the "ignoreExistingGroup" field of the data parameter is true, and the "id" field of the "info" field of data parameter is provided, will update the existing User Group if exists.
The uses listing of new Group is optional, but if provided, each User Id must be valid, or returns error status.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.FileBrowserServices.GetThumbnails(System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the thumb nails of given file names under specified folder

param.name: folderPath
param.para: The folder to get files listing for

param.name: fileNames
param.para: The array of file names.

param.name: type
param.para: The type of asset this folder is folder. The choices are "File", "Image", "Media", "Prebuilt", "Stylesheet"

returns.para: The thumbnail information of given files.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "list": [{ "basePath": "Images\/homeslider", "extension": "png", "fileName": "aeroplane.png", "height": 397, "imageSrc": "xml\/Images\/homeslider\/aeroplane.png", "randomizer": "2f5979cbc25f4ac7b1d77aa221faa726", "size": "137.25 KB", "width": 600 }, { "basePath": "Images\/homeslider", "extension": "png", "fileName": "balloon.png", "height": 512, "imageSrc": "xml\/Images\/homeslider\/balloon.png", "randomizer": "2f5979cbc25f4ac7b1d77aa221faa726", "size": "134.92 KB", "width": 384 }, { "basePath": "Images\/homeslider", "extension": "png", "fileName": "bg-green.png", "height": 20, "imageSrc": "xml\/Images\/homeslider\/bg-green.png", "randomizer": "2f5979cbc25f4ac7b1d77aa221faa726", "size": "0.95 KB", "width": 20 }, { "basePath": "Images\/homeslider", "extension": "png", "fileName": "bg-heading.png", "height": 23, "imageSrc": "xml\/Images\/homeslider\/bg-heading.png", "randomizer": "2f5979cbc25f4ac7b1d77aa221faa726", "size": "0.93 KB", "width": 30 }, { "basePath": "Images\/homeslider", "extension": "png", "fileName": "bg-sky.png", "height": 1600, "imageSrc": "xml\/Images\/homeslider\/bg-sky.png", "randomizer": "2f5979cbc25f4ac7b1d77aa221faa726", "size": "0.54 KB", "width": 5 }] } }

remarks.para: Retrieving thumbnails is an expensive operation for image files, since we need to dig into each image file to grab the sizing information.
To make sure the response time is reasonable for this operation, do not input too many files.
Generally, to make sure the response is less than 5 seconds, no more than 100 files.

member.name: T:IngeniuxCMService.MarkForPublishServices
member.summary: Provides functionality related to Mark for Publish and Unmark for Publish actions.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.MarkForPublishServices.GetPageMarks(IngeniuxCMService.GetPageMarksInput)
member.summary: Retrieves the Mark-for-publish information on given page(s)

param.name: data
param.para: The information on the page(s) to request mark-for-publish information for

returns.para: Collection of Publishing Targets information, also indication on each target on whether or not the given pages are marked for the target, and which version of this page was marked for the given target.
Also, the collection of information on all available previous versions of the pages and the mark-for-publish information on each version.

remarks.para: For each item in "pubTargets" collection: the "markedVersion" property indicating which version was marked for that target. If value is -1, then it is not marked for that target.

If multiple page ids are provided, the return marking information will be the first page in the selection. However, because it is on multiple pages, the "versions" collection will only list current version.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.UserGroupSelectionServices.GetUserGroupsForPages(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Retrieves the collection of Users or User Groups based on the given Pages and Transition
This operations is mainly used for retrieving the list of Users or Group for Page assignment, inside or outside of Workflow transition.
If Page is not in Workflow, it can be assigned to any User Groups, therefore all User Groups are returned.
If Page is in Workflow, and the assignment is happening through Transition (trantionId provided), then the Transition's Target Group is returned.
If Page is in Workflow, and the assignment is not through Transition (transitionId not provided), then the Current Group of the Workflow State is returned.
If Page is not in Workflow, it can be assigned to any Users, therefore all Users are returned.
If Page is in Workflow, and the assignment is happening through Transition (transitionId provided), then the Users that belong to the Transition's Target Group are returned.
If Page is in Workflow, and the assignment is not through Transition (transitionId not provided), then the Users that belong to the Current Group of the Workflow State are returned.
The result is combination of all Users/Users Groups each Page allows.

member.param: Id of the Pages to retrieve Users/User Groups for. "|" delimited to multiple Pages.
Id of the Transition to that be used to advance and assign the Page
Whether to retrieve list of User Groups or Users

returns.para: Collection of basic information of either Users and User Groups

remarks.para: If any Page with the provided Ids doesn't exists, returns error status, that contains all invalid Page Ids

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.UserGroupSelectionServices.GetUserGroupsForWorkflowAdd(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the collection of Users or User Groups available to assign the Page to, when Page is added to Workflow.
member.param: Id of the Page that will be added to Workflow
Id of the Workflow Definition the Page will be added to
Whether to retrieve Users or User Groups

returns.para: Collection of basic information of either Users and User Groups

remarks.para: If Page or Workflow Defintion doesn't exist, returns error status

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.IndexingSearchServices.Search(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Search in pages that match any of the given keywords, with given field name and schema name criterias
member.param: The keywords to search for. Please note that pages with matches of any of the keywords will be returned

param.name: fieldName
param.para: Narrow down which field to search for on the page
param.remarks: When left empty, search in all page fields

param.name: schemaName
param.para: Narrow down on the schema Root name that page was based on. Only pages with given root name will be search.
param.remarks: When left empty, search all pages

member.param: Specifies the given field is an element or attribute. Only applies when fieldName is specified.
Specifies whether to include page check out content in search. Page check out content will be separate entries.
Specifies whether to include previous version of the pages in search.
Specifies whether to allow pages in recycle folder to be included in search.

returns.para: Collection of page summaries that matches the given criterias.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "MaxScore": 5, "Results": [{ "AssignedUserOrGroup": "U|INGENIUX\\awang", "CheckedOut": true, "ID": "x100", "LastModifiedTime": "20140120T18:44:57", "Name": "Default Dynamic Schemas Test", "PageID": "x100", "Rank": 4, "Recycled": false, "Version": 0 }, { "AssignedUserOrGroup": "U|INGENIUX\\awang", "CheckedOut": true, "ID": "x87", "LastModifiedTime": "20140121T22:50:04", "Name": "Test", "PageID": "x87", "Rank": 4, "Recycled": false, "Version": 0 }] } }

member.remarks: The existing overview data retrieval returns XML data, which is inconsistent with the rest of the JSON API. Change it to standard response. Client Javascript must be changed to use JSON data.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.IOverviewServices.AddRecent(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a recent page for the current user.
member.returns: Always returns true
member.remarks: Only called from client when a page is loaded for user session.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.IOverviewServices.AddFavorite(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a favorite (watched) page entry in user activities.
member.returns: Always returns true.
member.remarks: Only called from client on overview page.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.IOverviewServices.RemoveFavorite(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a favorite (watched) page entry in user activities.
member.returns: Always returns true.
member.remarks: Only called from client on overview page.

member.name: T:IngeniuxCMService.OverviewServices
member.summary: Provides the functionality to access CMS general information and track current user activities.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.OverviewServices.GetOverview
member.summary: Retrieves the general overview information of both Ingeniux CMS Site information, and current user activities.

returns.para: The Ingeniux CMS global and current user information

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.OverviewServices.AddRecent(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a recently visited Page to the Recently Visited Page list for current user
member.param: Id of the Page to add to recently visited listing
member.returns: True when added, False if Page doesn't exist
member.remarks: Ingeniux CMS site keeps 10 entries of recent Pages. The oldest entries will be moved when over this limit.
If the page was already in the recent list, it will be moved to the top of the list

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.OverviewServices.AddFavorite(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new favorite Page for current user. Favorite Pages are pages user would like to visit frequently.
member.param: Id of favorite Page to add
member.returns: True when added, False if Page doesn't exist
member.remarks: Ingeniux CMS site keeps 10 entries of favorite Pages. The oldest entries will be moved when over this limit.
If the page was already in the favorites list, it will be moved to the top of the list

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.OverviewServices.RemoveFavorite(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a favorite Page entry
member.param: Id of the Page to remove from favorites list
member.returns: True if removed, False if Page doesn't exist, or not in the favorites list

member.summary: Update the Schema of the Page based on current Page content, only applies to Page's with presentations. If Page has no presentations, returns error status.
member.param: Id of the Page to use to Update schema with
Specifies to put the updated Schema in draft mode or not. Updated Schema in draft mode will not affect created Page content until saved to a new version.
member.returns: The Id of the updated Schema

remarks.para: If Page doesn't exist, returns error status
If Page's Schema was for some reason deleted (e.g. direct removal in Content Store database), returns error status

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.PageCommandsServices.SaveNewSchemaFromPage(System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Creates a new Schema based on given Page's content, only applies to Page's with presentations. If Page has no presentations, returns error status.

There are 2 Schemas with the same Root name allowed, one with Presentation, one without. Once this operation is carried out once on a Schema, it cannot be called again on the Pages with the new schema.
After the new Schema is saved, the Page used to create this Schema will be used the new schema instead of its previous one. All other Pages using the previous schema will not be affected.

member.param: Id of the Page to create new Schema with
Friendly Name of the new Schema, must not matching the Page's current Schema's friendly name.
member.returns: Id of newly created Schema

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SchemaDesignerServices.SyncPagesToSchema(IngeniuxCMService.SchemaSyncRequest)
member.summary: Synchronizes specified Pages to the latest version of their Schema. This operations will update Pages based on the Schema, but adding and removing fields to match the new Schema version. It will not touch any element or attribute values of the Pages.

param.para: Object containing Ids of the Pages to be synchronized

returns.para: Result of Synchronization

remarks.para: If Schema with given Root name doesn't exist, returns error status
During synchronization, site is locked to prevent any content changes. Site will be unlocked after synchronization is one.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.ISiteTreeServices.NewPageWorkflowCheck(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks to make sure that the current user can create a page with the given ruleId or schemaFile, by making sure that user is a member of the first workflow transition's group. Both parameters are optional, but if ruleId is specified, then the value of schemaFile is ignored.
member.remarks: From handler: newPageCheck

member.name: T:IngeniuxCMService.SiteTreeServices
member.summary: Provides the functionality to work with Ingeniux CMS site tree.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteTreeServices.MoveCopyPage(IngeniuxCMService.PageMoveCopyInformation,System.String)
member.summary: Moves or Copies a Page node from one location to another location. All the descendants of the Page node gets moved/copied together.

param.name: data
param.para: Instructions on the Move/Copy action

member.param: Id of the current Publishing Target, optional

returns.para: Updated information of the Page node that was moved, or new Page node that from created from the copy action
returns.example: Sample JSON return { "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "name": "Soap", "isFolder": false, "objectId": "x123", "props": { "name": "Soap", "allowedCategoryRoots": [], "ancestors": ["x1", "x2", "x100", "x103"], "assignedGroup": null, "assignedUser": { "name": "Turtle Master", "email": "awang@ingeniux.com", "userId": "INGENIUX\\awang" }, "canClaimPage": false, "canTranslate": false, "checkedOut": true, "error": null, "icon": 9, "isAssignedToOtherUser": false, "isEditable": true, "isInWorkflow": false, "justRecycled": false, "languageRootId": "", "lingualMaps": { "clones": [], "master": null }, "locale": "", "localeInherited": true, "markedForPublish": false, "markedForPublishAny": false, "markedForPublishPropagated": false, "nextPageId": null, "nextPageIndex": 0, "noDnd": false, "numChildPages": 0, "pageId": "x123", "parentId": null, "pendingMasterVersion": 0, "referenceProps": { "created": "20140130T18:12:31", "createdBy": "INGENIUX\\awang", "endDate": "00010101T00:00:00", "lastModified": "20140130T18:12:31", "lastModifiedBy": "User\/INGENIUX___awang", "publishAs": "", "startDate": "00010101T00:00:00" }, "remoteServer": "", "schemaFriendlyName": null, "schemaName": "SOAPServiceClient", "schemaOnLatestVersion": false, "securityLevel": 2, "userCanCopyPage": true, "workflow": null }, "readOnly": false, "title": "<\/span> Soap<\/span>", "widgetId": "x123" } }

remarks.para: This operation put all instructions of the move/copy action info one parameter. For operation that divice instructions into separate parameters, use the opertaion.
If target parent Page Is is not provided, use "x1", which is the Content Store Id
If either original Page or target parent Page doesn't exist, returns error status

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteTreeServices.CanMovePage(System.String[])
member.summary: Determines if a collection of Pages can be moved to another location by current User.
member.param: Ids of Pages to be determined

returns.para: Confirmation of whether the given Pages and their descendants can be moved. Returns warning if current User cannot reorder Page assigned to another User, and any of the Pages or descendants are assigned to another User

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteTreeServices.MoveCopyPageAdvanced(System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves or Copies a Page node from one location to another location. All the descendants of the Page node gets moved/copied together. This operation divides instructions of Move/Copy into separate parameters.
member.param: Array of Id of Pages to be moved
Target Page Id
Postion of placements relative to target Page Id, choices are "before", "after", or "child". Any other value returns error status
Whether to perform Copy or Move
Whether to trigger a different set of Custom hooks, on work with "Copy" action. When true, uses "OnBeforePasteSpecial" and "OnAfterPasterSpecial"; otherwise, uses "OnBeforeCopy" and "OnAfterCopy"
Locale to set on the Pages after move/copy
Id of the current Publishing Target

returns.para: Object containing information of the action executed, and properties of the Pages after move/copy.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "pageAction": "copy", "pageProperties": [{ "name": "Soap", "allowedCategoryRoots": [], "ancestors": ["x1", "x2", "x100", "x109"], "assignedGroup": null, "assignedUser": { "name": "Turtle Master", "email": "awang@ingeniux.com", "userId": "INGENIUX\\awang" }, "canClaimPage": false, "canTranslate": false, "checkedOut": true, "error": null, "icon": 9, "isAssignedToOtherUser": false, "isEditable": true, "isInWorkflow": false, "justRecycled": false, "languageRootId": "", "lingualMaps": { "clones": [], "master": null }, "locale": "", "localeInherited": true, "markedForPublish": false, "markedForPublishAny": false, "markedForPublishPropagated": false, "nextPageId": null, "nextPageIndex": 0, "noDnd": false, "numChildPages": 0, "pageId": "x108", "parentId": null, "pendingMasterVersion": 0, "referenceProps": { "created": "20140110T01:21:30", "createdBy": "INGENIUX\\awang", "endDate": "00010101T00:00:00", "lastModified": "20140130T18:49:40", "lastModifiedBy": "User\/INGENIUX___awang", "publishAs": "", "startDate": "00010101T00:00:00" }, "remoteServer": "", "schemaFriendlyName": null, "schemaName": "SOAPServiceClient", "schemaOnLatestVersion": false, "securityLevel": 2, "userCanCopyPage": true, "workflow": null }], "queryString": { "copy": false, "pageIds": "x108", "targetId": "x109" } } }

remarks.para: Non-existing Page are ignored.
All Pages specified will be placed as sibling after move/copy, without consideration of their original positions in the Site tree hierarchy.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteTreeServices.EmptyRecycleFolder
member.summary: Permenantly deletes all Pages placed under the Recycle Folder.

returns.para: Tree when deletions are successful. Otherwise, returns error status

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.SiteTreeServices.CreateNewPage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Page or Components, from either Page Creation Rule or Schema specified.
member.param: Id of the parent Page to create the new Page under
Name of the new Page
Id of the Page Creation Rule to use for Page Creation. Page Creation Rule is higher priority over Schema on this operation
Id of the Schema to use for Page creation
Name of the XSLT stylesheet file to assign to created Page. Only applies in Page Creation Rule scenario
Id of the User to assign the Page to after creation. If left null or empty, Page will be assigned to current User
Id of the current Publishing Target

returns.para: Object containing information of the action and property of the created Page
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "pageAction": "newpage", "pageProperties": { "name": "Detail", "allowedCategoryRoots": [], "ancestors": ["x1", "x2", "x112", "x116"], "assignedGroup": null, "assignedUser": { "name": "Turtle Master", "email": "awang@ingeniux.com", "userId": "INGENIUX\\awang" }, "canClaimPage": false, "canTranslate": false, "checkedOut": true, "error": null, "icon": 2, "isAssignedToOtherUser": false, "isEditable": true, "isInWorkflow": false, "justRecycled": false, "languageRootId": "x112", "lingualMaps": { "clones": [], "master": null }, "locale": "en-us", "localeInherited": true, "markedForPublish": false, "markedForPublishAny": false, "markedForPublishPropagated": false, "nextPageId": null, "nextPageIndex": 0, "noDnd": false, "numChildPages": 0, "pageId": "x124", "parentId": null, "pendingMasterVersion": 0, "referenceProps": { "created": "20140130T19:04:22", "createdBy": "INGENIUX\\awang", "endDate": "00010101T00:00:00", "lastModified": "20140130T19:04:22", "lastModifiedBy": "User\/INGENIUX___awang", "publishAs": "", "startDate": "00010101T00:00:00" }, "remoteServer": "", "schemaFriendlyName": null, "schemaName": "Details", "schemaOnLatestVersion": false, "securityLevel": 2, "userCanCopyPage": true, "workflow": null }, "queryString": { "pageName": "Detail", "parentPageId": "x116", "schemaFile": "schemas\/194" } } }

remarks.para: If Page doesn't exist, returns error status
If Page Creation Rule or Schema Id is specified, but don't exist, returns error status
If Page Creation Id is specified, uses Page Creation Rule to create the Page; Otherwise, uses Schema to create the Page
Specified "ss" XSLT stylesheet doesn't affect Page creation with Schema at all
Created new Page is checked out and assigned to specified User
If "userId" is not specified, Page will be assigned to current User

member.summary: Provides the functionality to manage the Ingeniux CMS taxonomy system.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.GetChildren(IngeniuxCMService.CategoryTreeNodeInfo,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves children Nodes of a specific Category Node in the Taxonomy Tree

param.name: node
param.para: Information on the Category Node to retrieve children for

remarks.para: The following of "widgetId" and "objectId" of the category must be "tta__[category node id]". If we are retrieving root nodes, the "widgetId" must be "tta_0", "objectId" is optional.

member.param: The Schema friendly name to filter out root Category nodes. This parameter is only needed when retrieving root Category nodes that the given schema allows
The currently selected Content Locale. The locale value affects the labels of Category nodes information.

returns.para: Array of full details for all child Category nodes of given Category node.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": [{ "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/3", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/3", "isFolder": true, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 1, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/3", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Animalia", "originalTypeName": "Kingdom", "path": "Animalia", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Kingdom", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Animalia" }, { "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/2", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/2", "isFolder": false, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 1, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/2", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Fungi", "originalTypeName": "Kingdom", "path": "Fungi", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Kingdom", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Fungi" }, { "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/1", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/1", "isFolder": false, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 1, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/1", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Plantae", "originalTypeName": "Kingdom", "path": "Plantae", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Kingdom", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Plantae" }] }

remarks.para: Taxonomy Tree doesn't have the concept of order. The result is always sorted alphabetically.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.GetCategoryAncestorIds(IngeniuxCMService.CategoryGetAncestorsPathInput)
member.summary: Retrieves the list of all ancestor Category Node Ids for a given Category Node

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing the current Category Node Id, and whether to return error status if Category doesn't exist.
param.remarks: If "alertMissingCategory" is set to false, returns empty array if Category doesn't exist.

returns.para: Array of all ancestor Category Node Ids. Starting from the Root Category.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.Move(IngeniuxCMService.CategoryMoveInput)
member.summary: Moves a Category Node from one location to another

param.name: data
param.para: Instruction of the Move action

returns.para: Array of all sibling Categories Nodes of the newly moved node in alphabetic order.
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": [{ "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/34", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/34", "isFolder": false, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 3, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/34", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Cestida", "originalTypeName": "Class", "path": "Animalia%2FCtenophora%2FCestida", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Class", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Cestida" }] }

remarks.para: All Name and Path information in the array of Category Nodes are URI encoded.
This operation requires current User to have the permission to manage Taxonomy System. If not, returns error status.

member.summary: Copies a Category Node and place it under specified target Category Node

returns.para: Details of newly created Category Node
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/65", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/65", "isFolder": false, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 3, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/65", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Plantae", "originalTypeName": "Kingdom", "path": "Animalia%2FCtenophora%2FPlantae", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Kingdom", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Plantae" } }

remarks.para: All Name and Path information in the array of Category Nodes are URI encoded.
This operation requires current User to have the permission to manage Taxonomy System. If not, returns error status.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.AddAssociationToCategory(IngeniuxCMService.CategoryAssociationManipulationInput)
member.summary: Associates a Category with a Page. This operation categiorizes the given Page with given Category.

param.name: data
param.para: Object containing Ids of Category and Page to create the new association

returns.para: Object containing the Id and Name of the Page that was just associated with the Category. It is always a two-items array, first item holds the Page Id, second item holds the Page name.

remarks.para: If Category or Page doesn't exist, returns error status
All Name and Path information in the array of Category Nodes are URI encoded.
This operation requires current User to have the permission to manage Taxonomy System. If not, returns error status.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.CreateNewCategory(IngeniuxCMService.CategoryCreateUpdateInput,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Category Node in a specific Locale.

param.name: data
param.para: Full details of the new Category Node to create, including the Parent Id.

remarks.para: To create a new Root Category, specify the "parentId" field of "data" parameter to "0".

member.param: Specifies the Locale of this new Category Node. This will be the "Creation Locale" of the new Category.

returns.para: Full details of the newly created Category
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/67", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/67", "isFolder": false, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 1, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/67", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Monera", "originalTypeName": "Kingdom", "path": "Monera", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Kingdom", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Monera" } }

remarks.para: If new Parent Id is not "0", but the new Parent Category doesn't exist, returns error status.
All Name and Path information in the array of Category Nodes are URI encoded.
This operation requires current User to have the permission to manager Taxonomy System. If not, returns error status.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.GetAssociationsToPage(IngeniuxCMService.GetPageCategorizationsInput)
member.summary: Retrieves all the Categories associated with given Page

param.para: Object containing the Id of the Page to get associations information for

returns.para: Collection of information of Category Nodes that are associated with the given Page.
Each item contains "attributes" and "elements" listing. "attributes" has Category Id only. "elements" item is a 3 items array that has Id, Name and Path of the Category Node item.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.TaxonomyTreeServices.SetCategoryInformation(IngeniuxCMService.CategoryCreateUpdateInput,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the details of Category Node

param.name: data
param.para: New information for the Category. Doesn't include associations information.

member.param:
The environmental Locale to perform the update under.
If the locale is the same as the Category's creation Locale, the original Name and Description will be changes; Otherwise, we are updating the translations in the target Locale.

returns.para: The full details of the updated Category
returns.example:
Sample JSON return
{ "code": 0, "error": null, "message": { "objectId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/66", "widgetId": "tta__CategoryNodes\/66", "isFolder": false, "props": { "associatedPages": null, "creationLocale": "en-us", "depth": 2, "description": "", "everyoneName": "Everyone", "externalId": "", "id": "CategoryNodes\/66", "idPrefix": "tta", "originalDescription": "", "originalTitle": "Lophotrochozoa", "originalTypeName": "Phylum", "path": "Animalia%2FLophotrochozoa", "permissions": [{ "name": "Everyone", "id": "0", "accessLevel": 2 }], "permissionsInherited": true, "synonyms": [], "translated": true, "typeName": "Phylum", "visibility": 1 }, "title": "Lophotrochozoa" } }

remarks.para: If Category doesn't exist, returns error status.
If locale is not specified, or empty, default to "en-us".
This operation requires current User to have the permission to manager Taxonomy System. If not, returns error status.

member.summary: Retrieves the detailed information of a Workflow Definition.

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.WorkflowServices.DeleteWorkstate(IngeniuxCMService.DeleteWorkstateInput)

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.WorkflowServices.GetWorldviewWorkflowStatus

member.name: M:IngeniuxCMService.WorkflowServices.FixWorldviewWorkflows
member.summary: Fixes the Worldview Workflows, create the necessary Workstates and Workflow Definitions.

returns.para: The result of fixing operation, including the Id of Workflow Definitions that were created, and remaining missing Workflow Definitions and Workstates
